mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (userId, title, content, tags, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tags}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, tags = #{tags}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE postId = #{postId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts WHERE tags LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tag}, '%');
